subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Chris Snee of the Giants, a son-in-law of Coach Tom Coughlin, ended his 10-year career as a right guard after winning two Super Bowls and appearing in four Pro Bowls.
snippet: Chris Snee of the Giants, a son-in-law of Coach Tom Coughlin, ended his 10-year career as a right guard after winning two Super Bowls and appearing in four Pro Bowls.
